title: Gera
html: GERA(Geʹra) [possibly, Alien Resident].1. Son of Benjamin’s firstborn Bela. (1Ch 8:1, 3) The designation “sons” at Genesis 46:21, where Gera is listed, apparently includes grandsons.2. Evidently another descendant of Bela the Benjamite; possibly identical with the Gera mentioned in 1 Chronicles 8:7.—1Ch 8:5.3. Father of Benjamite Judge Ehud.—Jg 3:15.4. Father of the Benjamite Shimei who called down evil upon David.—2Sa 16:5; 19:16, 18; 1Ki 2:8.
